snippet: United States regulators said on Friday they were postponing a significant part of the financial regulatory overhaul after banks said they would not be ready for the new rules.
abstract: United States regulators said on Friday they were postponing a significant part of the financial regulatory overhaul after banks said they would not be ready for the new rules.

headline.print_headline: Regulators Postpone Part of Financial Overhaul

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Office of the Comptroller of the Currency

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
